events.message: I recently ordered a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because the size I received does not fit me at all.
The customer's issue has been classified under the Refund cluster based on keywords such as refund and size issue.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to assist with the customer's refund request for the jacket.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear the jacket didn’t fit. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original condition for processing the refund?
Sure, my order number is 789654123. The jacket is unused and still has the original tags attached.
Thank you for the details. We will send you a prepaid return label via email shortly. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the help and look forward to the refund.
The refund case has been marked resolved after sending the return label and confirming the refund timeline with the customer.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with regarding your order.
Since the customer confirmed satisfaction with the refund process, the support case has now been officially closed.
